## useUnobservedProperty() function

Convenient wrapper to get properties off of Observables that aren't fully observable, using onChange to update an intermediate value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useUnobservedProperty<O extends Observed, P>(observable: O, property: string): P;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  observable | O |  |
|  property | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

P
